title: A Dose of reality
creator_credit: Andrew Dobbyn, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Andrew Dobbyn feels he has lived a privileged life. A baby boomer with a war veteran father, Dobbyn’s family did what they could to help the wives and children of those who didn’t return from the war. Despite this, Dobbyn felt he could be doing more and highlights two events in his life that showed him just how lucky he is.
